derivation: (Jeremiah 48:21) or מֵיפַעַת; or מֵפַעַת; from H3313 (יָפַע); illuminative;
outline:
Mephaath = "splendour" or "height"
  1. a city of Reuben allotted to the Merarite Levites lying in the district of the Mishor; site uncertain
  2. a city in Moab
strongs_def: Mophaath or Mephaath, a place in Palestine
